name: Chasm (itch) (Goblin Range)
description:
Short Horror Game for the Just Fucking Finish Jam. Majority of the code was done with Playmaker. The theme was "The Illusion of Choice".

WASD to Move, Click to Interact and F to Toggle your Flashlight.

Bugs:

In the main game, the cursor doesn't start locked so try to move it to the center of the screen for your first click.

Enemies have an audio clip in editor, but it broke in the build. I can't figure out how to fix it yet, and I think it makes the game a bit more frustrating when they come from behind you but what can I do, man?
